TopicTitle: EXPIRED Limited Time Challenge: Hunt for easter eggs

Articles.Content:
Expired Challenge

 

Simple enough, a fun idea, should go well. In this topic you will be set on a couple of missions around the solar system, the goal is to find as many easter eggs as you can! Good luck, this thread will expire at the end of the day.

Heres a few I know of that can get you started:

Moho’s Mohole

This is found at the north pole of moho, it is very difficult to find, but is very rewarding.

Minmus’s Ancient Monument

This is a blue statue on minmus, in a crater near the north pole.

Mun Arch

This one is a classic, you can find it at the muns… equator, i guess, ill just show you a picture.


Dres Canyon

Ah, another classic! Dres now has three on em, so they are even easier to find!

 

Land on, jool?

Im guessing this is supposed to be liquid metallic hydrogen (if im wrong, correct me) but yeah I guess thats cool…

 

Anyways that should be enough for now, ill take requests for any other easter eggs (theres a lot)

Good luck!

 

 

 

Edited April 10, 2023 by Little 908

Sure, I'm going to take some time to cruise around Duna today, finally. After dealing with Easter Eggs IRL this should be a nice way to cap the night. But I'm not hopeful. I always used... what was it... Kerbnet? With the Rover Body on a satellite in polar orbit. How are you finding them? Infinite fuel and unbreakable crafts? Cause that's what I'm about to do. Are they the same as KSP1?
